content: That sounds like a great idea! I'm really excited to try out the distressed denim shorts. And yeah, I'm trying to be more mindful of my fashion choices and support brands that align with my values. Speaking of which, I've been wanting to check out Madewell's new summer collection. They're one of my favorite fashion stores, and I've heard great things about their new line. Do you think you could give me some info on their sales and promotions?
